channel.title: Drop editor
channel.description:
so i followed a guide on making a dropeditor.bat now idk what the problem is everything seems fine but when i try to edit the drops say the drop rates and 100% and i change to 10% and then i repack i go back to that drop and its at 100% again so i was wondering if anyone could help me out with that.
guide i followed http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/snippets/430278-718-drop-editor.html

item.title: Drop editor

item.description:
@penguinimp wrote:

post your code snippet, i’m more a perl/java guy, not sure if i’ll be able to help. Code is code though so perhaps.
